name: the labyrinth of dreams
description:
the labyrinth of dreams

 Hello everyone, I bring you a short game that I made for the game jam, but due to some inconveniences I couldn't finish it in time.

 The game: The background story would be that the protagonist is in a deep sleep from which he cannot wake up and the only way he can wake him up is by completing the labyrinth, for this he must look for 2 keys that are somewhere in the labyrinth, when he obtains both keys the door that is in the center of the maze will open, passing through it you will be able to wake up. 

The labyrinth: The maze is circular in shape and has walls at the bottom and top, it is divided into segments, which the player will be able to rotate the subsequent segment by means of levers and cranks scattered throughout the maze. 

The keys appear at different points, the first in the upper maze and the second in the lower one. 

I hope you like this little and short game, by the way don't be afraid to jump into the void, because strange things happen in dreams xD and watch out for witches.
